document.full_text: pavel datsyuk had a goal and set up three others as the detroit red wings charged to an early lead then held on to edge the phoenix coyotes 4-3 on saturday and take a 2-0 series lead in their quarter-final playoff.
document.title: datsyuk powers wings to win over coyotes and series lead
lines_and_colors: pavel datsyuk had a goal and set up three others as the detroit red wings charged to an early lead then held on to edge the phoenix coyotes 4-3 on saturday and take a 2-0 series lead in their quarter-final playoff.
